original_text: and he made no distinction between us and them, having cleansed their hearts by faith.
korean_text: 믿음으로 그들의 마음을 깨끗이 하사 그들이나 우리나 차별하지 아니하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: and he made no distinction between us and them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 우리와 그들을 차별하지 않으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: having cleansed their hearts by faith.
